hero.desc: Frontend Developer crafting modern, responsive, and user-friendly web interfaces. Focused on clean code, performance, and pixel-perfect, scalable, production-ready projects.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm a passionate Frontend Developer from Egypt with 1+ year of hands-on experience crafting modern, responsive web interfaces. I've completed 10+ projects and gained real-world experience through 3+ internships. I love turning ideas into clean, performant, and pixel-perfect experiences using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and React.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I work with

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: Academic foundation & professional development
education.bootcampDesc: Intensive 36-hour bootcamp covering technical workshops and hands-on activities in modern frontend development.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey and learning experiences

description: Developed responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Implemented reusable UI components and clean code practices.
Collaborated with team members using Git & GitHub.
Translated UI/UX designs into functional web pages.
Improved frontend performance and user experience.
Built projects using React, Bootstrap, and RESTful APIs.
Learned best practices in state management and component structuring.
Worked on team projects following agile methodology.
Mastered React.js fundamentals including component lifecycle, Hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext).
Integrated REST APIs efficiently into React applications.
Built comprehensive full-stack web applications using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript for frontend.
Implemented backend technologies for server-side logic.
